00044 #define FUBreak \
00045     static bool ignoreAssert = false; \
00046     if (!ignoreAssert) { ignoreAssert = FUAssertion::OnAssertionFailed(__FILE__, __LINE__); }
00047 #else
00048 
00051 #define FUBreak  { FUAssertion::OnAssertionFailed(__FILE__, __LINE__); }
00052 
00053 #endif // _DEBUG

00057 #define FUFail(command) { FUBreak; command; }
00058 
00064 #define FUAssert(condition, fall_back) { if (!(condition)) { FUBreak; fall_back; } }
